attributes.action: I want school uniforms not to be mandatory.
attributes.additional_details: I have asked many students about what they think of their uniforms and lost people said that the didn’t really like wearing it. It may let the students look professional but it doesn’t mean they have to be uncomfortable due school.
attributes.background: School uniforms have always bugged me and definitely not just me. A lot of them are expensive which struggles the parents. Also, most of them are uncomfortable. I am not saying remove them but just don’t make it mandatory.
